subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks absorbed a rout by the Rockets to conclude a 1-3 trip. They have lost nine of their last 10 games, the last two without the injured Carmelo Anthony, to fall to 7-13.
snippet: The Knicks absorbed a rout by the Rockets to conclude a 1-3 trip. They have lost nine of their last 10 games, the last two without the injured Carmelo Anthony, to fall to 7-13.
